titleStmt.title: A letter farther and more fully evidencing the Kings stedfastnesse in the Protestant religion, written by Mounsier de l'Angle minister of the Protestant church at Roven in France to a friend of his in London,
titleStmt.author: L'Angle, Samuel de.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by A.W. for Joshua Kirton at the Queens Arms in St. Pauls Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: A variant has replaced the imprint word "Queens" with "Kings".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
